snippet: A national judicial review panel has made its findings public on Richard F. Cebull, a former judge in Montana whose emails, sent from his federal account, showed disdain for blacks, women, American Indians, Hispanics and others.
lead_paragraph: A national judicial review panel has made its findings public on Richard F. Cebull, a former judge in Montana whose emails, sent from his federal account, showed disdain for blacks, women, American Indians, Hispanics and others.

headline.main: Judge Sent Hundreds of Emails Showing Bias
headline.print_headline: Judge Sent Hundreds Of Emails Showing Bias
